title: chandhra kalavadhamsam
sahitya:
candra kalaavadamsam samsEvE tam

candrakalaa vadamsam

(candra)



anupallavi



indra mugaamara samstuda vaibavam

upEndra pitaamahaa nadacaraNam bavam

(candra)



kaamadarba haram kaala garvaharam

taamara sOtbava ksheershaharam haram

booma balaandaga haram puraharam varam

maamaga maanasa taamasa dinakaram

(candra)
